attributes.documentation: @title The Token interface is a subset of the ERC20 specification.
attributes.name: Token

attributes.documentation: @title The Oracle interface provides exchange rates for ERC20 tokens in wei.
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.documentation: @title Control handles wallet access control.
attributes.name: Control

attributes.documentation: @dev Executable only by the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @dev Executable only by the controller.
attributes.name: onlyController

attributes.documentation: @dev Executable by either owner or controller.
attributes.name: eitherOwnerOrController

attributes.documentation: @dev Add a new controller to the list of controllers.
attributes.name: addController

attributes.documentation: @dev Re-usable internal function that adds a new controller.
attributes.name: addControllerInternal

attributes.documentation: @dev Remove a controller from the list of controllers.
attributes.name: removeController

attributes.documentation: @dev Re-usable internal function that removes an existing controller.
attributes.name: removeControllerInternal

attributes.documentation: @title Whitelist provides payee-whitelist functionality.
attributes.name: Whitelist

attributes.documentation: @dev Check if the provided addresses array has a valid length.
attributes.name: validLength

attributes.documentation: @dev Check if the provided addresses contain the owner address.
attributes.name: hasNoOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Add initial addresses to the whitelist.
 @param _addresses are the Ethereum addresses to be whitelisted.
attributes.name: initializeWhitelist

attributes.documentation:
@dev Add addresses to the whitelist.
 @param _addresses are the Ethereum addresses to be whitelisted.
attributes.name: submitWhitelistAddition

attributes.documentation: @dev Confirm pending whitelist addition.
attributes.name: confirmWhitelistAddition

attributes.documentation: @dev Cancel pending whitelist addition.
attributes.name: cancelWhitelistAddition

attributes.documentation:
@dev Remove addresses from the whitelist.
 @param _addresses are the Ethereum addresses to be removed.
attributes.name: submitWhitelistRemoval

attributes.documentation: @dev Confirm pending removal of whitelisted addresses.
attributes.name: confirmWhitelistRemoval

attributes.documentation: @dev Cancel pending removal of whitelisted addresses.
attributes.name: cancelWhitelistRemoval

attributes.documentation: @title SpendLimit provides daily spend limit functionality.
attributes.name: SpendLimit

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns the available daily balance - accounts for daily limit reset.
 @return amount of ether in wei.
attributes.name: spendAvailable

attributes.documentation:
@dev Initialize a daily transfer limit for non-whitelisted addresses.
 @param _amount is the daily limit amount in wei.
attributes.name: initializeSpendLimit

attributes.documentation:
@dev Set a daily transfer limit for non-whitelisted addresses.
 @param _amount is the daily limit amount in wei.
attributes.name: submitSpendLimit

attributes.documentation: @dev Confirm pending set daily limit operation.
attributes.name: confirmSpendLimit

attributes.documentation: @dev Cancel pending set daily limit operation.
attributes.name: cancelSpendLimit

attributes.documentation:
@dev Modify the spend limit and spend available based on the provided value.
 @dev _amount is the daily limit amount in wei.
attributes.name: modifySpendLimit

attributes.documentation: @dev Update available spend limit based on the daily reset.
attributes.name: updateSpendAvailable

attributes.documentation: @title Asset store with extra security features.
attributes.name: Vault

attributes.documentation: @dev Construct a wallet with an owner and a controller.
@dev Check if the value is not zero.
attributes.name: notZero

attributes.documentation: @dev Ether can be deposited from any source, so this contract must be payable by anyone.

attributes.name: balance
transfer

attributes.documentation: @title Asset wallet with extra security features and gas topup management.
attributes.name: Wallet

attributes.documentation:
@dev Returns the available daily gas top up balance - accounts for daily limit reset.
 @return amount of gas in wei.
attributes.name: topupAvailable

attributes.documentation:
@dev Initialize a daily gas top up limit.
 @param _amount is the gas top up amount in wei.
attributes.name: initializeTopupLimit

attributes.documentation:
@dev Set a daily topup top up limit.
 @param _amount is the daily topup limit amount in wei.
attributes.name: submitTopupLimit

attributes.documentation: @dev Confirm pending set top up limit operation.
attributes.name: confirmTopupLimit

attributes.documentation: @dev Cancel pending set top up limit operation.
attributes.name: cancelTopupLimit

attributes.documentation:
@dev Modify the topup limit and topup available based on the provided value.
 @dev _amount is the daily limit amount in wei.
attributes.name: modifyTopupLimit

attributes.documentation: @dev Update available topup limit based on the daily reset.
attributes.name: updateTopupAvailable

attributes.documentation:
@dev Refill owner's gas balance.
 @param _amount the amount of ether to transfer to the owner account in wei.
attributes.name: topupGas
